TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpWebClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.WebClientProtocol
Public MustInherit Class HttpWebClientProtocol Inherits WebClientProtocol

summary.span: 表示所有使用 HTTP 傳輸通訊協定之 XML Web Service 用戶端 Proxy 的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for all XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP transport protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別上的屬性用來控制用來傳輸 XML Web 服務要求和回應 HTTP 要求物件的行為。The properties on this class are used to control the behavior of the HTTP request object used to transmit the XML Web service request and response. 屬性會對應至屬性上找到。The properties map to properties found on . 若要與 XML Web service 使用 HTTP 通訊，您必須建立 proxy 類別，衍生自的間接或直接XML Web 服務。To communicate with an XML Web service using HTTP, you must create a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service. 而不是手動建立 proxy 類別，您可以使用 Wsdl.exe 工具來建立指定的 XML Web 服務的服務描述的 proxy 類別。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, you can use the Wsdl.exe tool to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 由於 httpwebclientprotocol 衍生所有 proxy 類別的基底類別，其屬性是位於您的 proxy 類別。Since HttpWebClientProtocol is the base class for all proxy classes, its properties are on your proxy classes. 這些屬性可用於控制基礎傳輸的要求行為。These properties are useful for controlling the request behavior of the underlying transport. 例如，使用屬性呼叫 XML Web service 透過防火牆。For example, use the property for calling XML Web services through a firewall. 其中許多屬性用來初始化提出 Web 要求。Many of these properties are used to initialize the that makes the Web request. ，和直接或間接衍生自為 SOAP，提供支援 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 分別。, , and derive directly or indirectly from to provide support for SOAP, HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST respectively. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫名為 XML Web 服務的 ASP.NET Web 表單`Math`。The following example is an ASP.NET Web Form, which calls an XML Web service named `Math`. 內`EnterBtn_Click`函式，Web 表單可讓伺服器自動重新導向至其他站台的用戶端。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` function, the Web Form allows the server to automatically redirect the client to other sites. 它也會設定用戶端驗證認證、 proxy 設定、 要求編碼方式和要求的逾時之前呼叫 XML Web 服務方法。It also sets client authentication credentials, proxy settings, the request encoding and the time out for the request before calling the XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

threadsafe.span: 這個類別的內容複製到的新執行個體每個 XML Web 服務方法呼叫的物件。

span.span: The properties on this class are copied into a new instance of a object for each XML Web service method call.

threadsafe.span: 雖然您可以在同一個呼叫 XML Web service 方法執行個體從不同的執行緒在相同的時間，不會同步完成，以確保一致的快照集的屬性取得傳送到物件。

span.span: While you can call XML Web service methods on the same instance from different threads at the same time, there is no synchronization done to ensure that a consistent snapshot of the properties gets transferred to the object.

threadsafe.span: 因此，如果您需要修改屬性，以及進行並行方法呼叫來自不同執行緒，您應該使用不同的執行個體的 XML Web 服務 proxy，或提供您自己的同步處理。

span.span: Therefore, if you need to modify the properties and make concurrent method calls from different threads you should use a different instance of the XML Web service proxy or provide your own synchronization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowAutoRedirect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用戶端是否自動遵循伺服器重新導向。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the client automatically follows server redirects.

value.span: 若要自動重新導向用戶端以遵循伺服器重新導向，則為 ，否則，即為 。

span.span: to automatically redirect the client to follow server redirects; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端傳送的驗證資訊，例如使用者名稱和密碼，您不想讓伺服器重新導向，因為這可能危及安全性。If a client sends authentication information, such as a user name and password, you do not want to enable the server to redirect, because this can compromise security. A則會擲回屬性是`false`且 Web 伺服器會嘗試將要求重新導向。A is thrown if the property is `false` and the Web server attempts to redirect the request. 屬性包含物件，其中同時和屬性會反映在嘗試重新導向的相關詳細資料。The property contains an object, where both the and properties reflect details regarding the attempted redirect. 屬性包含相當於 HTTP 重新導向狀態碼 （301、 302、 和 307） 和`Location`標頭內集合指向重新導向到嘗試要求的 URI。The property contains an equivalent to one of the HTTP redirect status codes (301, 302, and 307) and the `Location` header within the collection points to the URI that the request attempted to be redirected to.

exception.span: 屬性為 ，並且 Web 伺服器嘗試重新導向要求。

span.span: The property is and the Web server attempts to redirect the request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void CancelAsync(object userState) cil managed

param.name: userState
param.span: 方法的非同步呼叫之最後一個參數中提供的物件。

span.span: The object provided in the last parameter to the asynchronous call of the method.

summary.span: 取消對 XML Web Service 方法的非同步呼叫，除非呼叫已完成。

span.span: Cancels an asynchronous call to an XML Web service method, unless the call has already completed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificates As X509CertificateCollection

summary.span: 取得用戶端憑證的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of client certificates.
An that represents the client certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓呼叫 XML Web 服務方法時，傳遞一個或多個用戶端憑證，也稱為 Authenticode X.509 v.3 憑證，用戶端。This property allows a client to pass one or more client certificates, also known as Authenticode X.509 v.3 certificates, when calling an XML Web service method. 如果 XML Web service 方法已設定使用用戶端憑證，用戶端憑證可用來當作一項機制來驗證用戶端。If the XML Web service method has been configured to use client certificates, a client certificate can be used as one mechanism for authenticating a client. 如需設定用戶端憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 文件。For details on setting up client certificates, see the Internet Information Services (IIS) documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以用戶端憑證，從檔案載入及再將它加入屬性呼叫 XML Web 服務方法使用用戶端憑證進行驗證。The following code example demonstrates how to load in a client certificate from a file and then add it to the property for calling an XML Web service method that uses client certificates for authentication. [!code-csharp[HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates/CS/certcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.ClientCertificates/VB/certvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::CookieContainer ^ CookieContainer { System::Net::CookieContainer ^ get(); void set(System::Net::CookieContainer ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of cookies.

value.span: ，表示 Web 服務用戶端的 Cookie。

span.span: A that represents the cookies for a Web Services client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web 服務方法使用工作階段狀態，然後 cookie 傳遞回回應標頭 XML Web 服務用戶端可唯一識別該 XML Web 服務用戶端的工作階段。If an XML Web service method uses session state, then a cookie is passed back in the response headers to the XML Web service client that uniquely identifies the session for that XML Web service client. 為了讓用戶端的維護工作階段狀態的 XML Web service，用戶端必須儲存 cookie。In order for an XML Web service to maintain session state for a client, the client must store the cookie. 用戶端收到 HTTP cookie 所建立的新執行個體並指派以proxy 類別，然後再呼叫 XML Web service 方法的屬性。Clients receive the HTTP cookie by creating a new instance of and assigning that to the property of the proxy class before calling the XML Web service method. 如果您需要維護超過工作階段狀態，當超出範圍的 proxy 類別執行個體時，用戶端必須儲存到 XML Web 服務的呼叫之間的 HTTP cookie。If you need to maintain session state beyond when the proxy class instance goes out of scope, the client must store the HTTP cookie between calls to the XML Web service. 比方說，Web Form 用戶端時，可以透過儲存儲存 HTTP cookie在它自己的工作階段狀態。For instance, a Web Forms client can store the HTTP cookie by saving the in its own session state. 因為並非所有的 XML Web 服務會使用工作階段狀態，因此用戶端不一定需要使用用戶端 proxy 的屬性，XML Web service 的文件必須狀態是否使用工作階段狀態。Because not all XML Web services use session state and thus clients are not always required to use the property of a client proxy, the documentation for the XML Web service must state whether session state is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是使用工作階段狀態的 XML Web service 的 Web Form 用戶端。The following code example is a Web Forms client of an XML Web service that uses session state. 用戶端會儲存可唯一識別工作階段，將它儲存在用戶端的工作階段狀態的 HTTP cookie。The client stores the HTTP cookie that uniquely identifies the session by storing it in the client's session state. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer/CS/serverusageclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol.CookieContainer/VB/serverusageclientvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::IWebProxy ^ Proxy { System::Net::IWebProxy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::IWebProxy ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 Proxy 資訊，以製作穿越防火牆的 XML Web Service 要求。

span.span: Gets or sets proxy information for making an XML Web service request through a firewall.

value.span: ，包含用於產生穿越防火牆之要求的 Proxy 資訊。

span.span: An that contains the proxy information for making requests through a firewall.

value.span: 預設值是作業系統 Proxy 設定。

span.span: The default value is the operating system proxy settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用如果用戶端需要使用不同的 proxy 設定，比在 系統設定的屬性。Use the property if a client needs to use different proxy settings than those in the system settings. 使用類別來設定 proxy 設定，因為它實作。Use the class to set the proxy settings, because it implements . 可以在組態檔中設定預設 proxy 設定。Default proxy settings can be set in a configuration file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定網際網路應用程式](~/docs/framework/network-programming/configuring-internet-applications.md)。For details, see [Configuring Internet Applications](~/docs/framework/network-programming/configuring-internet-applications.md). ## Examples 下列範例會設定下列的 proxy 設定，再叫用`Math`XML Web service: proxy 伺服器http://proxyserver，proxy 連接埠為 80 及 proxy 伺服器的本機位址略過。The following example sets the following proxy settings prior to invoking the `Math` XML Web service: the proxy server to http://proxyserver, the proxy port to 80 and the bypass to the proxy server for local addresses. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebClientProtocol.Proxy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在用戶端使用 NTLM 驗證連接到裝載 XML Web Service 的 Web 伺服器時啟用連線共用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether connection sharing is enabled when the client uses NTLM authentication to connect to the Web server that hosts the XML Web service.

value.span: 如果啟用共用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if connection sharing is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定的值屬性用來與 Web 伺服器通訊。This property sets the value of the property of the used to communicate with the Web server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UserAgent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 針對隨著每個要求所傳送的使用者代理標頭，取得或設定值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the user agent header that is sent with each request.

value.span: HTTP 通訊協定使用者代理標頭的值。

span.span: The value of the HTTP protocol user agent header.

value.span: 預設值為 MS Web 服務用戶端通訊協定 ，其中的 是 Common Language Runtime 的版本 (例如 1.0.3705.0)。

span.span: The default is "MS Web Services Client Protocol ", where is the version of the common language runtime (for example, 1.0.3705.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者代理字串可讓網頁伺服器以識別用戶端。The user agent string allows a Web server to identify the client. ## Examples [!code-cpp[HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent/CPP/httpwebclientprotocol_useragent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent/CS/httpwebclientprotocol_useragent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebClientProtocol_UserAgent/VB/httpwebclientprotocol_useragent.vb#1)]
